creator: 2B Found
descriptionHtml:
2B FOUND – A “Worthwhile & Purposeful” Mobile Application, is the World’s First Video & Picture sharing + Thorough Personalized 'Sports Profile' based Networking platform that’s Exclusive for SPORTS!!
and It's the first product from 2B Found Sports Pvt Ltd.

On Technological Terms - 2B FOUND is Both ‘Social Media’ and ‘Social Networking’ Platform that caters Exclusively to SPORTS as a whole domain for “Anyone & Everyone” associated with Sports to

>> Display their Sports Skills
>> Ask their Sports Queries / Clarifications (Sport Injury-Recovery related Qs too!)
>> Expert advice to others Qs
>> Enlighten others with their Sports Skill, Technique & Knowledge (Gym & fitness / wellness too)
>> Express their Sports Opinions, Views, Suggestions and much more in the best possible way eventually leading them to get recognized & be found!
Further,
>> Sports Clubs can showcase / boast off their specialization & infrastructure
>> Sports Enthusiasts can upload ALL INFORMATIVE + EXCITING + CONTEMPORARY + LIVE ACTION BASED SPORTS VIDEOS too!
>> Sports ‘Club or Team or Star’ Followers & Admirers can celebrate their cherished action, moment or moves from the Sport
>> All Sports related Reviews by Reviewers and Critics

For,
# ALL SPORTS
# Performance Sports too = Gym / Fitness based Training

Who,
# Sports Talents
# Sports Coaches
# Sports Enthusiasts / admirers
# Sports Experts / Reviewers / Critics
# Everyone interested in SPORTS!

Also,
# Connect with fellow Sports Talents / Players (whoever is part of the sport at all levels)
# Connect with Coaches
# Connect with all like-minded Sports Heads
# Actively Express, Engage and be part of everything that happens within the World of SPORTS!


Key Highlights:

2B Found will help the young unidentified raw Sports talents and the lesser-known but extremely talented coaches who never really got their chance - A real chance by enabling them do the below,

SPORTS TALENTS can upload videos displaying their respective SPORT Skills,

They can also ask Qs about their Sport(s) techniques, injury concerns / niggles to the wider audience.

Coaches can upload enlightening videos with regard to their Sport(s) to accentuate their recognition.

They all can have an unrestricted & effortless "CONNECT" with 'Targeted Sports Profiles'! - Just imagine the prospects when all this can happen in a platform that's Exclusive for Sports!!

END Result = TALENTS who are not playing at the professional level or even those who hail from the remotest of locations will also be visible to the Sports administrators, leading coaches and the entire Sporting community!!

2B Found is primarily aimed at bringing out the hidden Sports Talents while at the same time not compromising on the entertainment value by admitting all Sports related action.


Key Features:

A first of its kind ‘2BF’ Ranking sourced by the platform to give an accurate measure on the overall Standard of a content.

Another first of its kind User Profile flow with Precise Profile creation - You get to choose who you actually are!

An innovative Quality Control Flow to reaffirm & ensure that “All you get to do & see here is ONLY SPORTS!”

An all new Interesting, Very Uniquely Designed, Detailed & Extremely Engaging ‘About Profile View’ like no other with all the details that you would like to see & be seen in a ‘Sports Profile’.

Connect and reach out to all profiles without any restrictions as you’re here to do only your sport thing!

A 'No' Nonsense platform, cyber stalkers only get to cyber stalk your Sports side!

Report the bullies and block the harassers. Keep them all away!

Get rid of the derogatory comments by yourself. Yes, you have the power to delete the comments received for your videos!

More ways to Express - users will be able to upload pictures as well! which will be played with a set duration of 5 seconds in the main video playing screen.
The feature is accessible to all.
